metadata.dc:author: Romero-Nieva Lozano, Jerónimo
metadata.dc:description: The author reviews continuing professional development in nursing as a demand for quality, its accreditation, the existing demand in our country the entities which provide such services, its relationship to a professional career, and the value-added step as a structural axis of our profession. All these topics are supported with the most recent data.
metadata.dc:title: Actualidad de la formación continuada en enfermería.
[The present situation of continuing professional development in nursing].
